actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: The target is poisoned until the start of the wyvern’s next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: After biting a creature other than a construct or undead, the wyvern regains 2d10 + 10 hit points.

actions.name: Claws
actions.extra: Large or smaller creatures are grappled.

actions.name: Swallowing Bite
actions.extra: If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed. The scavver can have one creature swallowed at a time. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover, and takes 3d8 poison damage at the start of each of the scavver’s turns. If the scavver takes 15 damage or more in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls prone within 10 feet. If the scavver dies, a swallowed creature can escape by using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can replace one attack with its claws.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.extra: The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 7d6 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

actions.name: Petrifying Gaze
actions.onFail: agility halved (save ends at end of each of the target’s turns)
actions.notes: On a failed save, the target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Discharge
actions.notes: Creatures that fail are knocked prone. Recharge 5–6.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. While flying, it can use its claws twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 7d6 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed. A swallowed creature has total cover and takes 1d6 acid damage at the start of each of the whale’s turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures (which fall prone within 10 feet). If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail
actions.extra: Or 6d6 + 16 bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: plus 1d6 acid damage

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.text: The dragonfly halves the damage it takes from an attack that it can see.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: The attack is made with advantage if the target is a creature that is missing any hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can use its claws in place of one or both bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be grappled.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.extra: The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 11d6 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. If the target fails the save, it is poisoned; at the start of its next turn it takes 1d6 poison damage and can repeat the save. The effect lasts until it succeeds or dies.

legendaryActions.name: Detect
legendaryActions.text: The wyvern makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendaryActions.name: Move
legendaryActions.text: The wyvern moves as if it were its turn.

legendaryActions.name: Sting (Costs 3 Actions)
legendaryActions.text: The wyvern makes a stinger attack.

legendaryActions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.notes: The wyvern can then fly up to half its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes one Bite attack and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Sting
actions.extra: Target is poisoned until the start of the wyvern’s next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hippogriff makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Sting
actions.extra: plus 2d6 poison damage

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: The attack is made with advantage if the target is a creature that is missing any hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes two attacks with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: plus 4d6 poison damage; DC 13 Constitution save or paralyzed until the end of the wyvern’s next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes one Bite attack and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Sting
actions.extra: Target is poisoned until the start of the wyvern’s next turn.

actions.name: Tail Sting
actions.extra: plus 3d6 poison damage

actions.name: Attack
actions.extra: plus 3d6 poison damage

actions.name: Flak Burst
actions.notes: A creature that is Huge or larger has disadvantage on this save.

onFail.condition: stunned (until end of its next turn)

actions.name: Dive Bomb
actions.text: If the mount moves at least 40 feet straight toward a target and then hits with a melee attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2d8 bludgeoning damage and must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The Vah'k'rel makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Swallowing Bite
actions.extra: If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed. The scavver can have one creature swallowed at a time. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover, and takes 2d10 acid damage at the start of each of the scavver’s turns. If the scavver takes 25 damage or more in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls prone within 10 feet. If the scavver dies, a swallowed creature can escape by using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

bonusActions.name: Ray of Fear (Recharge 4–6)
bonusActions.onFail: frightened until the start of the scavver’s next turn

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes one Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: DC 14 Constitution save or the target cannot regain hit points until treated with greater restoration or similar magic.

actions.name: Tail Sting
actions.extra: plus 3d6 poison damage

actions.name: Ethereal Stride
actions.text: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The unicorn makes one Hooves attack and one Radiant Horn attack.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The unicorn casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Druidcraft, 1/Day Each: Calm Emotions, Dispel Evil and Good, Entangle, Pass without Trace, Word of Recall

bonusActions.name: Unicorn’s Blessing (3/Day)
bonusActions.text: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn and casts Cure Wounds or Lesser Restoration on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting

legendaryActions.name: Charging Horn
legendaryActions.text: The unicorn moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it makes one Radiant Horn attack

legendaryActions.name: Shimmering Shield
legendaryActions.text: The unicorn targets itself or one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target gains 10 (3d6) Temporary Hit Points, and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the unicorn’s next turn. The unicorn can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: The hydra withdraws its limbs and heads into its shell. Until it emerges as a bonus action, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the hydra has the prone condition, its speed is 0 and can't increase, its heads can't die, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take any other actions or reactions.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and takes 6d6 acid damage at the start of each of the kraken’s turns.

legendaryActions.name: Tentacle Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.text: The kraken makes one Tentacle attack with one of its tentacles.

legendaryActions.name: Fling
legendaryActions.text: The kraken uses Fling with one of its tentacles.

legendaryActions.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
legendaryActions.text: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 2d10 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. A strong current disperses the cloud; otherwise it disappears at the end of the kraken’s next turn.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.extra: The target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained.

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, it takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.target: one creature grappled by the kraken
actions.notes: If the target is Large or smaller, it is swallowed and no longer grappled. A swallowed creature is restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and takes 7d6 acid damage at the start of each of the kraken’s turns.

legendaryActions.name: Toxic Ink
legendaryActions.onFail: poisoned and blinded until the end of the kraken’s next turn
legendaryActions.notes: Then the kraken moves up to its Speed. The kraken can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fling
actions.notes: One Large or smaller creature grappled by the kraken is thrown to a space the kraken can see within 60 feet of itself that isn’t in the air.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.extra: The target is grappled (escape DC 20) and restrained until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.extra: when the Triceratops moves through a large or smaller creature it can make one stomp attack as a free action

actions.name: Stomp
actions.extra: when the Stegosandros moves through a large or smaller creature it can make one stomp attack as a free action

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spinosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon makes three Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.extra: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6).
actions.notes: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: The dragon withdraws its limbs and heads into its shell. Until it emerges as a bonus action, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the dragon has the prone condition, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take any other actions or reactions.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon makes three Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.extra: If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6).
actions.notes: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: The dragon withdraws its limbs and heads into its shell. Until it emerges as a bonus action, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the dragon has the prone condition, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take any other actions or reactions.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon turtle makes one Bite or Tail attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.extra: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.extra: If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6).
actions.notes: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: The dragon withdraws its limbs and heads into its shell. Until it emerges as a bonus action, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the dragon has the prone condition, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take any other actions or reactions.

legendaryActions.name: Attack
legendaryActions.text: The dragon turtle makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendaryActions.name: Move
legendaryActions.text: The dragon turtle moves up to its speed. If the dragon turtle is swimming, this movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

legendaryActions.name: Boiling Aura (Costs 3 Actions)
legendaryActions.notes: The dragon turtle radiates intense heat. Until the start of the dragon turtle's next turn, whenever a creature starts its turn within 20 feet of the dragon turtle, that creature must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 40 (9d8) fire damage. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

MythicActions.name: Bite
MythicActions.text: The dragon turtle makes one Bite attack.

MythicActions.name: Armor of Storms (Costs 2 Actions)
MythicActions.text: Lightning temporarily surrounds the dragon turtle, and it gains 40 temporary hit points until the start of its next turn. Until all these temporary hit points are gone, any creature that touches the dragon turtle or hits it with a melee attack takes 26 (4d12) lightning damage.
